content.question: In lines 3-4, cum annos eius et censum sicut praeceperas ederem is translated

choices.label: as you had instructed me to declare his wealth with his age
when I was declaring his age and wealth as you had instructed
when I instructed you about his age and wealth as he declared it
since you had instructed that I should declare his age and wealth

content.answer: when I was declaring his age and wealth as you had instructed

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
